license_watching_enabled.label: Enable Text file update
license_watching_enabled.tooltip: Whether the script should put the license for the current song to a file.

license_file.label: Path to license file
license_file.tooltip: Write the full path to the file containing the licenses in the incompetech specified format

out_file.label: Path to output file
out_file.tooltip: Path to the File that streamlabs read and is put in as overlay.

verbose.label: Write play/pause status to log
verbose.tooltip: Check if you want messages like 'Now playing X' or 'paused or stopped' appear in the log.

warnings.label: Write warnings of unknown songs to log
warnings.tooltip: If the song metadata cannot matched to a license, show a warning.

ask_song_enabled.label: Enable chat command
ask_song_enabled.tooltip: Whether viewers can ask in chat for current music title.

command.label: Command
command.tooltip: Command to ask for current song.

message_template.label: Message template
message_template.tooltip: Template for the reply. {title} will be replaced with the title and {author} with the interpret/author.

foobar_title.label: Title format string
foobar_title.tooltip: Format string defined in Foobar to parse the title. Available under `File` -> `Preferences` -> `Display` -> `Default User Interface`. Won't work with functions (yet).
